product_description.message: Opens all links within the currently selected area in new tabs.

selection_alert_noSelection.message: Nothing selected. Please select an area first!
selection_alert_noSelection.description: Explains the user that he has to select an area in order to open links

selection_alert_nothingFound.message: No links found within the selected area.
selection_alert_nothingFound.description: Explains the user that no links were found within the selected area

selection_alert_tooManyLinks.message: You have $amount$ links to open. Are you sure you want to open them all at once?
selection_alert_tooManyLinks.description: Warning the user that opening all links may slow down his computer or causes a crash

menu_main.description: Main context menu label that leads to the sub menus

menu_sub_all.description: Sub context menu label that leads to open all links

menu_sub_image.description: Sub context menu label that leads to open images only

menu_sub_video.description: Sub context menu label that leads to open video only

menu_sub_audio.description: Sub context menu label that leads to open audio only
